attributes.action: road safety spancarr cross rd derbyshire a632
attributes.additional_details:
Petition for road safety at spancarr cross roads after 63 injuries recorded along the A632 between Belond Lane and Slack Lane between August 2002 and July 2012 including one fatality ( this does not include the latest accident in which 2 local young men lost there lives and several more were injured )

in responce to this we are asking for speed cameras ,Traffic lights or a roundabout at spancarr  and also to reduce the speed through kelstedge to 30 hopefully a combenation of  these actions will be able to reduce these figures dramatically and protect residents ,walkers and the many others who will need to cross this road and prevent drivers from using this strecth as a race track which is aspecially dangerous in the dark winter months with reduced visability and  claimed a life at kelstedge

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
